div.div: The College of N.J. vs. SUNY Cortland
at Cortland, NY | Cortland Stadium Red

tr.td: Cortland wins toss, defers. TCNJ receives. Cortland defends south goal
Nick Daley kickoff 66 yards to the TCNJ4, Scotty Mathurin return -1 yards to the TCNJ3.
